targets.rawSql: select convert_km(distance::numeric, '$length_unit') from drives where id = $drive_id;

SELECT
	((start_[[preferred_range]]_range_km - end_[[preferred_range]]_range_km))
FROM
	drives d
JOIN cars car ON car.id = car_id
WHERE
	d.id = $drive_id;

SELECT
	(distance/(start_[[preferred_range]]_range_km - end_[[preferred_range]]_range_km))
FROM
	drives d
JOIN cars car ON car.id = car_id
WHERE
	d.id = $drive_id;

panels.description: Ce qui est affiché dans la voiture.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
	1000*((start_[[preferred_range]]_range_km - end_[[preferred_range]]_range_km) * 0.94 * car.efficiency)/convert_km(distance::numeric, '$length_unit')
FROM
	drives d
JOIN cars car ON car.id = car_id
WHERE
	d.id = $drive_id;

panels.title: Consommation Affichée

panels.description: Calculée avec un la constante autonomie EPA

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
	1000*((start_[[preferred_range]]_range_km - end_[[preferred_range]]_range_km) * car.efficiency)/convert_km(distance::numeric, '$length_unit')
FROM
	drives d
JOIN cars car ON car.id = car_id
WHERE
	d.id = $drive_id;

panels.title: Consommation Théorique

targets.rawSql:
SELECT extract(epoch FROM (end_position.date - start_position.date))
FROM drives
LEFT JOIN positions start_position ON start_position_id = start_position.id
LEFT JOIN positions end_position ON end_position_id = end_position.id
WHERE drives.id = $drive_id;

SELECT distance/duration_min*60 AS avg_speed
FROM drives
LEFT JOIN positions start_position ON start_position_id = start_position.id
LEFT JOIN positions end_position ON end_position_id = end_position.id
WHERE drives.id = $drive_id;

panels.description: Calculée avec ce que la voiture affiche

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
	(start_[[preferred_range]]_range_km - end_[[preferred_range]]_range_km)* 0.94 * car.efficiency
FROM
	drives d
JOIN cars car ON car.id = car_id
WHERE
	d.id = $drive_id;

panels.title: Énergie Utilisée Affichée

panels.description: Calculée avec un la constante de consommation EPA de la voiture

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
	((start_[[preferred_range]]_range_km - end_[[preferred_range]]_range_km)* car.efficiency)
FROM
	drives d
JOIN cars car ON car.id = car_id
WHERE
	d.id = $drive_id;

panels.title: Énergie Théorique Utilisée

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
	$__time(date),

	convert_km([[preferred_range]]_battery_range_km, '$length_unit') AS "Autonomie (théorique) [$length_unit]",
	battery_level AS "Niveau de Batterie [%]"
FROM
	positions
WHERE
 car_id = $car_id AND
 $__timeFilter(date)
ORDER BY
	date ASC

SELECT
  $__time(date),
   latitude,
   longitude
   FROM positions
WHERE 
  car_id = $car_id AND 
  $__timeFilter(date)
ORDER BY date ASC

SELECT
	$__time(date),
	convert_km(speed, '$length_unit') AS "Vitesse [$length_unit/h]",
	power AS "Puissance [kW]",
	convert_km([[preferred_range]]_battery_range_km, '$length_unit') AS "Autonomie (théorique) [$length_unit]",
	convert_km(est_battery_range_km, '$length_unit') AS "Autonomie (est.) [$length_unit]",
	battery_level AS "Niveau de Batterie [%]",
	usable_battery_level AS "Niveau de Batterie Utilisable [%]"
FROM
	positions
WHERE
 car_id = $car_id AND
 $__timeFilter(date)
ORDER BY
	date ASC

SELECT
	$__time(date),
	ROUND(convert_m(elevation, '$alternative_length_unit')) AS "Altitude [$alternative_length_unit]"
FROM
	positions
WHERE
 car_id = $car_id AND
 $__timeFilter(date)
ORDER BY
	date ASC

SELECT
	$__time(date),
	convert_celsius(outside_temp, '$temp_unit') AS "Température Extérieure [°$temp_unit]",
	convert_celsius(inside_temp, '$temp_unit') AS "Température Intérieure [°$temp_unit]",
	convert_celsius(driver_temp_setting, '$temp_unit') as "Température Conducteur [°$temp_unit]",
	convert_celsius(passenger_temp_setting, '$temp_unit') as "Température Passager [°$temp_unit]",
  is_climate_on::integer AS "Climatisation",
	fan_status AS "Ventilation"
FROM
	positions
WHERE
 car_id = $car_id AND
 $__timeFilter(date)
ORDER BY
	date ASC

SELECT CONCAT_WS(' - ', round(convert_km(start_km::numeric, '$length_unit')), round(convert_km(end_km::numeric, '$length_unit')))
FROM drives d
WHERE d.id = $drive_id

list.definition: SELECT name AS __text, id AS __value FROM cars;
list.label: Car
list.name: car_id
list.query: SELECT name AS __text, id AS __value FROM cars;

list.definition: select case when unit_of_length = 'km' then 'm' when unit_of_length = 'mi' then 'ft' end  from settings limit 1;
list.name: alternative_length_unit
list.query: select case when unit_of_length = 'km' then 'm' when unit_of_length = 'mi' then 'ft' end  from settings limit 1;
